author: Opinion by Kent Sepkowitz
title: Why New York has been hit so hard by coronavirus
description: New York state reached a tragic milestone this week: It now has more Covid-19 patients than any country in the world, aside from the United States.
content:
Kent Sepkowitz is a CNN medical analyst and a physician and infection control expert at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center in New York City. The views expressed in this commentary are his own. View more opinion at CNN.
